thread.title: Obama’s remarks about mass shooting at Oregon community college
thread.title_full: Obama’s remarks about mass shooting at Oregon community college - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Obama’s remarks about mass shooting at Oregon community college
text: President Obama on Thursday, visibly frustrated, addressed the shooting at Umpqua Community College in Roseburg, Ore. Here is the full text of his remarks: There's been another mass shooting in America -- this time, in a community college in Oregon. That means there are more American families -- moms, dads, children -- whose lives have […] ...
